title: To all our generous and charitable countrey-men within the cityes of Dantzick and Konings-berg, and the kingdom of Poland. The humble representation of the principall and masters of the Marischall Colledge of Aberdeen in Scotland.
author: Osburn, James.
notes: Signed: Iames Osburn T.P., George Liddell S.M.P., Robert Paterson Principal. George Peacock Regent. Iames More Regent. Alexander More Regent. William Smith Regent. Marischall Colledge of Aberdeen, June 2d, 1699.
Reproduction of original in the Aberdeen University Library.
